des: "This pink drink isn't just for ladies. A heady combination of gin and applejack are shaken together with egg white and lemon juice for a frothy drink that's given a pink hue thanks to a few drops of grenadine."
ins: Combine gin, applejack, lemon juice, grenadine, and egg white in a cocktail shaker. Cover and shake for 10 to 20 seconds to emulsify the egg white. Add ice; cover and shake until chilled. Strain into chilled wine glass.
